title: Relaxing Time
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Aaah~, that’s good, can you go up a little bit?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Okay. Around here~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ah, yeah, that’s the spot. It feels nice.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, I’m glad. Then, I’ll massage this spot too, okay.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Okay.... Aaah~, so good~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Alright, it’s done! How was it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Phew, it felt amazing. You’re really good at massaging, huh, Emma-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ehehe, I’ve been practicing recently. I was thinking about what I can do to help everyone relax.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Not only is the massage good, but your voice is also so soothing that I almost fell asleep, Emma-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, then I guess it’s a success, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
